constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DUNCAN:
H.R. 1409.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
Amendment 1--which protects the freedom of speech; The FCC
has in prior years abridged that freedom (without an Act of
Congress). This legislation prevents such abridgement in the
future.
[Page H859]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

title: RUSH WAS RIGHT Act of 2021
